description: OPINION AND ORDER. Plaintiff may not recover pursuant to the modified lost volume seller theory.  Plaintiff shall, on or before Tuesday, November 13, 2007, file with and serve a revised damages calcul ation consistent with the Court's findings.  Defendant shall file and serve a response to plaintiff's recalculation, on or before Thursday, December 13, 2007, should it desire to do so.  Upon receipt of the parties' further filings, the Court intends to direct the entry of a final judgment. Signed by Judge George W. Miller. (tj1, )
